  • Uses of IEqualityHelper in org.eclipse.emf.compare.utils

    Classes in org.eclipse.emf.compare.utils that implement IEqualityHelper 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EqualityHelper
    EMF Compare needs its own rules for "equality", which are based on similarity instead of strict equality.
